mainHero.title: Pragati : Progress
mainHero.subtitle: for the people of India
mainHero.description: Pragati is an innovative marketplace designed to bridge the gap between India's vast unorganized sector and discerning consumers. Our platform connects skilled professionals, artisans, and laborers with customers seeking reliable and affordable services. Whether you need a carpenter, plumber, tailor, or any other skilled worker, Pragati offers a seamless way to find and hire trusted local talent.

items.title: Find Trusted Local Services with Pragati
items.description: Discover reliable and skilled professionals for all your needs on Pragati. Whether you need a carpenter, plumber, tailor, or delivery service, our platform connects you with verified workers from India's unorganized sector. Enjoy quality services at affordable prices, all at your fingertips. Simplify your life with Pragati today.

items.title: Empower Your Skills with Pragati
items.description: Join Pragati and unlock new opportunities for your skills. Whether you're a carpenter, plumber, tailor, or delivery person, our platform connects you with consumers looking for reliable services. Enhance your livelihood, gain visibility, and grow your business with Pragati. Empower your future with us.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best services out there!
features.description: Pragati is the premier marketplace designed to uplift and empower India's unorganized sector. Our platform bridges the gap between skilled professionals—such as delivery partners, carpenters, plumbers, security guards, and other personnel—and consumers seeking reliable, affordable services. With a strong commitment to credibility and quality, Pragati ensures that every worker is verified and every service meets high standards. By facilitating these connections, Pragati not only helps consumers find trusted local services but also provides workers with enhanced visibility and new opportunities to grow their businesses.

sections.name: Navneet Chandra
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
